• I am above 18 years of age and legally eligible to ride a bike.
 • I hold a valid driving license and will produce it on demand.
 • I will submit my original identity proofs for verification; all documents submitted are genuine and belong to me.
 • I will take full responsibility for any damage, loss, or theft of the bike during the rental period.
 • I will ensure the bike is returned on or before the agreed time.
 • A late return will attract additional charges as per the rental policy.
 • I will not use the bike for any illegal activities or reckless driving.
 • I will wear a helmet and follow all traffic rules and regulations while riding.
 • I understand that any challans/fines during my rental duration are to be paid by me.
 • I agree that in case of mechanical issues, I will inform the owner immediately and not attempt unauthorized repairs.

Declaration:\n1. We hereby declare that no rental amount has been collected from the customer by us. The responsibility of rent collection lies solely with the respective vehicle owners.\n2. We shall not be held liable for any damage to the vehicle or for any issues related to payment recovery or refunds.

Ans. Yes you need to submit the following documents:
 1.Address proof
 2.Driving Licence 
 3.Booking receipt
Ans.You will receive soft-copy of the following documents:\n 1.Address proof\n 2.Driving Licence
